title: Merge data availability info from detached datasets
body:
Example

```
% git clone https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-phase2
% cd studyforrest-data-phase2
% git annex init
% git annex whereis sub-01/ses-localizer/func/sub-01_ses-localizer_task-objectcategories_run-1_bold.nii.gz

  Failed to get annex.uuid configuration of repository origin
whereis sub-01/ses-localizer/func/sub-01_ses-localizer_task-objectcategories_run-1_bold.nii.gz (2 copies) 
    2f51364e-815a-4ad9-b380-617c682b1680 -- [mddatasrc]
    40809380-c618-4801-bb8d-81320474c9da -- studyforrest phase2 original source repository
ok
```

Now datalad also has this dataset, albeit with a Git history that is not based on the original repo, but an independently generated dataset based on openfmri tarballs. To get this as an additional data source, we can do this:

```
% git remote add datalad http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000113d/.git
% git fetch datalad
% git annex merge
% git annex whereis sub-01/ses-localizer/func/sub-01_ses-localizer_task-objectcategories_run-1_bold.nii.gz
  Failed to get annex.uuid configuration of repository origin
whereis sub-01/ses-localizer/func/sub-01_ses-localizer_task-objectcategories_run-1_bold.nii.gz (4 copies) 
    2f51364e-815a-4ad9-b380-617c682b1680 -- [mddatasrc]
    40809380-c618-4801-bb8d-81320474c9da -- studyforrest phase2 original source repository
    590d0da0-e791-4848-a09e-a47c70939758 -- datalad-archives
    c1be0852-f8e7-4b2b-8809-14ce4dd170f9 -- yoh@smaug:/mnt/btrfs/datasets/datalad/crawl/openfmri/ds000113d
ok
```

This is a seemingly clean way to add new data sources without having to interfere with the appearance/history of a dataset. Afterwards the remote could safely be removed again (if desired) without loosing data availability info.
